attributes.action: Only give booster COVID 19 vaccine to at risk groups .
attributes.additional_details: In order to get on top of this epidemic.
attributes.background:
Recommend COVID 19 booster vaccine to at risk groups in the Uk.
Give remaining vaccines to Covax for distribution to countries whose populations have not received any vaccines at all.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: 

Limit the Covid-19 booster programme to alleviate global vaccine inequality:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/594690
